column1: Uchi////Reflected in their menu as well
column2: Uchi Houston's décor is formed by fusing the most appealing aspects of Uchi and Uchiko together.  The entrance is arched with offset-stacked wooden planks
column3: giving the restaurant a classy yet modern feel
column4: and the lighting consists of round bulbs attached to winding metal bars
column6: intimate dining experience.  The dark red wallpaper imprinted with plum trees was copied from Uchi Austin.
